resources.string: Application developed during the development project in Telecom Bretagne by the following students :\n Durand Louis, Guyard Valentin, Jacquemod Laura and Thiam Mariam\n
We wanted to thank our tutor, Gwenaël Brunet, information and network technician at the department Image and Treatment of Information.

You are a little hummingbird in a field full of menhirs in Brittany and you have to taste all the flowers covering the meadow.

 You can only fly straight and change direction when you are in front of an obstacle (menhir or fence). 
 
 BEWARE the magical flowers which, once fecundated by the pollen your beak carries, transforms into a menhir !
